forgot-password.title: Forgot Password
forgot-password.subtitle: Reset your password with your email
forgot-password.description: Forgot your password? No problem. Just enter your email address below and we'll email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.

1.title: Enter your email
1.subtitle: Make sure you enter the correct email address.

2.title: Check your email
2.subtitle: Look for the email we just sent.

3.title: Create a new password
3.subtitle: Create a strong password you can remember easily.

recomendations.2: Make sure you entered the correct emai
recomendations.3: Wait a few minutes and try again

banner.title: Verify Your Email
banner.message: Thanks for signing up! Before getting started, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you?
banner.successMessage: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration.
